species.name: excadrill
descriptions: Forming a drill with its steel claws and head, it can bore through a steel plate, no matter how thick it is.
It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
It’s not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill’s rampant digging.
Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.
More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

abilities.name: sand-rush
abilities.effect: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: mold-breaker
abilities.effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.
